title: DDFP 409: Week 13 preview & Favorite TV Shows
itunes:title: DDFP 409: Week 13 preview & Favorite TV Shows
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt Harmon to make their Week 13 "Red Challenge Flag" picks. Also, the guys visit some of the most memorable Week 12 "Sound FX," as well as some of the best field goal finishes in NFL history. Plus, Matt "The Goth Kid" Gothard introduces the new "Say What?!" segment, where Shek addresses a tweet from a Football Baby critic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
